metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12203 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Denial of service vulnerability in Platform Sample/ Silicon Referencefirmware for 8th Generation Intel Core Processor, 7th Generation Intel CoreProcessor may allow privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary codevia local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12203` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20190514.0ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20190514.0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
